body:
ApiErrorResponse object

Common reponse for erroneous requests.

Example JSON representation

{
  "errors": [
    {
      "code": "string", 
      "message": "string"
    }
  ], 
  "meta": {
    "sample": "string"
  }, 
  "warnings": [
    {
      "code": "string", 
      "message": "string"
    }
  ]
}

Properties

property attributes valid values description filter option
errors
Array of ApiMessage objects 		read-only
meta
ApiMetaContainer object 		read-only
warnings
Array of ApiMessage objects 		read-only
